item.title: Docker Tutorial : PhpMyAdmin and MySQL Server
item.description: If you are new to Docker or you are wondering why docker is very popular today, I recommend you to read my previous posts Introduction to Docker. Requirement For this tutorial, you need a linux machine. I am using an Orangepi server because it is very performant and affordable. Orangepi3 LTS: Buy it here Pull Containers from Docker registry Searching for containers Docker have a public registry where you could find images of dockerized application that are ready to use.
